abstract: Fauzia Abdur-Rahman, Jamaica native, has operated popular food cart outside Bronx criminal and civil courthouses for nearly two decades; her signature jerk chicken dish is among offerings that have become daily lunch ritual for lawyers, judges, social workers and clerks in area.

headline.print_headline: Near Bronx Courthouses, a Lunch-Hour Anchor That Rolls Away Daily
headline.main: What’s for Lunch? Go See the Cart Lady of the Bronx Courthouses

snippet: Fauzia Abdur-Rahman, whose attempts at cooking while growing up in Jamaica often ended badly, has operated a popular food cart in the Bronx for two decades.
lead_paragraph: Fauzia Abdur-Rahman, whose attempts at cooking while growing up in Jamaica often ended badly, has operated a popular food cart in the Bronx for two decades.
